attributes.action: Protect old age pensioners from violence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Any person convicted of an unprovoked attack upon an old age pensioner should have a minimum of two years imprisonment

Any person convicted of an unprovoked attack upon an old age pensioner causing actual bodily harm should have a minimum of five years imprisonment

Any person convicted of an unprovoked attack upon an old age pensioner causing grievous bodily harm should have a minimum of fifteen years imprisonment

Any person convicted of a raping an old age pensioner should serve a minimum of twenty five years imprisonment
